AboutPage.title: About
AboutPage.description: glm-image.ai is an independent AI image generation service that helps you create structured, knowledge-rich images with superior prompt understanding and layout capabilities.
AboutPage.introduction: üëã Hi there! This is glm-image.ai, an AI image generation service designed for creating high-quality images with clear layout, accurate text, and strong prompt understanding. If you have any questions, welcome to contact us.

features.title: Why Use GLM Image AI Generator?
features.subtitle: Powerful Features
features.description: GLM Image is designed for complex, information-dense visuals with superior understanding and layout capabilities.

item-1.title: Better Understanding of Prompts
item-1.description: GLM Image handles long and detailed prompts more effectively, producing images that match the intended structure and meaning.

item-2.title: Clear Layout & Structure
item-2.description: Ideal for visuals that require titles and sections, labels and annotations, and balanced composition.

item-3.title: Improved Text Handling
item-3.description: GLM Image performs better than many traditional image models when generating images containing text.

item-4.title: Efficient & Practical
item-4.description: Designed for users who need usable images, not just artistic experiments.

features2.title: What Can You Create with GLM Image?
features2.subtitle: Use Cases
features2.description: From infographics to educational content, GLM Image helps you create professional visuals.

features3.title: What Is GLM Image?
features3.subtitle: Advanced AI Technology
features3.description: GLM Image is an advanced AI image generation technology designed for complex, information-dense visuals.

item-1.title: Semantic Understanding
item-1.description: Deep comprehension of prompt meaning and intent for accurate image generation.

item-2.title: Logical Layout
item-2.description: Intelligent arrangement of visual elements for clear and organized compositions.

item-3.title: Readable Text
item-3.description: Superior text rendering capabilities for labels, titles, and annotations.

item-4.title: Clear Visual Hierarchy
item-4.description: Structured organization that guides the viewer's attention effectively.

item-5.title: Professional Quality
item-5.description: Suitable for educational, commercial, and professional image creation.

item-6.title: Practical Results
item-6.description: Focus on usable, real-world visuals rather than just artistic experiments.

item-1.question: Is this an official GLM Image website?
item-1.answer: No. This is an independent AI image generation service and is not affiliated with any model developer.

item-2.question: Can GLM Image generate images with readable text?
item-2.answer: GLM Image generally performs better than many AI image models when handling text, titles, and labeled elements. However, results may vary depending on prompt complexity.

item-3.question: Is GLM Image good for commercial use?
item-3.answer: Yes. Images generated through this service can be used for commercial purposes, subject to the platform's terms of service.

item-4.question: Do I need design experience to use GLM Image?
item-4.answer: No design skills are required. Simply describe your idea, and the AI will generate the image for you.

item-5.question: Is GLM Image different from other AI image generators?
item-5.answer: Yes. Compared to many image generators that focus mainly on artistic style, GLM Image is better suited for structured layouts, knowledge-heavy visuals, and images containing text and labels.

item-6.question: What types of images work best with GLM Image?
item-6.answer: GLM Image works especially well for infographics, diagrams and charts, educational illustrations, and posters and presentation visuals.

item-7.question: How long does image generation take?
item-7.answer: Most images are generated within 30-60 seconds, depending on complexity and server load. More detailed prompts may take slightly longer.

item-1.name: Jonathan Yombo
item-1.quote: MkSaaS is really extraordinary and very practical, no need to break your head. A real gold mine.

item-2.name: Yves Kalume
item-2.quote: With no experience in webdesign I just redesigned my entire website in a few minutes with tailwindcss thanks to MkSaaS.

item-3.name: Yucel Faruksahan
item-3.quote: Great work on MkSaaS template. This is one of the best personal website that I have seen so far :)

item-4.name: Anonymous author
item-4.quote: I downloaded the one of MkSaaS template which is very clear to understand at the start and you could modify the codes/blocks to fit perfectly on your purpose of the page.

item-5.name: Shekinah Tshiokufila
item-5.quote: MkSaaS is redefining the standard of web design, with these blocks it provides an easy and efficient way for those who love beauty but may lack the time to implement it.

item-6.name: Oketa Fred
item-6.quote: I absolutely love MkSaaS! The component blocks are beautifully designed and easy to use, which makes creating a great-looking website a breeze.

item-7.name: Zeki
item-7.quote: MkSaaS is the perfect fusion of simplicity and versatility, enabling us to create UIs that are as stunning as they are user-friendly.

item-8.name: Joseph Kitheka
item-8.quote: MkSaaS has transformed the way I develop web applications. Their extensive collection of UI components, blocks, and templates has significantly accelerated my workflow.

item-9.name: Khatab Wedaa
item-9.quote: MkSaaS is an elegant, clean, and responsive tailwind css components it's very helpful to start fast with your project.

item-10.name: Rodrigo Aguilar
item-10.quote: I love MkSaaS ‚ù§Ô∏è. The component blocks are well-structured, simple to use, and beautifully designed. It makes it really easy to have a good-looking website in no time.

item-11.name: Eric Ampire
item-11.quote: MkSaaS templates are the perfect solution for anyone who wants to create a beautiful and functional website without any web design experience.

item-12.name: Roland Tubonge
item-12.quote: MkSaaS is so well designed that even with a very poor knowledge of web design you can do miracles. Let yourself be seduced!
